rules_text:
Vanishing 5
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
Whenever a time counter is removed from Precarious Ledgers, you may have target player mill a card.
notes:
!ub
!inpend Vanishing 5/add/ (This permanent enters with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
